# AVFragmentedAsset

**Class**

An asset with a duration that the system can extend without modifying its existing media data.

## Declaration

```swift
class AVFragmentedAsset
```

## Overview

By using an `mvex` box in their `moov` box, QuickTime movie files and MPEG-4 files can indicate that they accommodate additional fragments. To determine whether a fragmented asset can monitor the addition of fragments, check the value of its [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAsset/canContainFragments] property.

Associate a fragmented asset with an instance of [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVFragmentedAssetMinder] to know when the system appends new fragments. When it has an associated asset minder, [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVFragmentedAssetTrack] posts [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAssetDurationDidChangeNotification] notifications whenever it detects new fragments. It may also post [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAssetContainsFragmentsDidChangeNotification] and [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAssetWasDefragmentedNotification], as the documentation of those notifications explains.

## Loading tracks

- **tracks**: The tracks an asset contains.
- **loadTrack(withTrackID:completionHandler:)**: Loads a track that contains the specified identifier.
- **loadTracks(withMediaType:completionHandler:)**: Loads tracks that contain media of a specified type.
- **loadTracks(withMediaCharacteristic:completionHandler:)**: Loads tracks that contain media of a specified characteristic.

## Accessing tracks

- **tracks**: The tracks an asset contains.
- **track(withTrackID:)**: Returns a track that contains the specified identifier.
- **tracks(withMediaType:)**: Returns tracks that present media of a specified type.
- **tracks(withMediaCharacteristic:)**: Returns tracks that present media of a specified characteristic.

## Fragmented assets

- **AVFragmentedAssetTrack**: An object that provides the track-level interface to inspect a fragmented asset’s media tracks.
- **AVFragmentedAssetMinder**: An object that periodically checks whether the system adds new fragments to a fragmented asset.
- **AVFragmentMinding**: A protocol that defines whether an asset supports fragment minding.
